name: Musix
description:
Like Tetris but find it stale after a while?

Love rhythm games and music from the upcoming game composer jtrev23?

We got you covered on both fronts!

Musix is a different type of rhythm game where blocks move from left to right across the screen in 2une to the song. Unlike Tetris where the game continues until you lose, the goal of each level is to survive until the player reaches the end of the song. 

Musix offers both a story mode and quick play options in case you want to play the grueling story mode or take it easy and practice in quick play. 

Furthermore Musix also offers accessibility features such as a color blind mode and slow mode in case you want to showcase the game to others or just listen to the beat. 

Enjoy the game and look forward for future updates on this new puzzle rhythm game featuring blocks, the most basic shape ;)

Created for the Drawing Board Discord's 2020 game jam by Jtrev23, Biggo_doodle, Sun, and Opal
